name: Super WaaHoo Bros
description:
Based on the viral video "Super WaaHoo Bros" from the youtube channel "Sr. Pelo", this game is about the (probably) pumbler WaaHoo trying to save the Princess Pitch and her babehs from Bowsah. Explore this magical world with WaaHoo and discover the mysteries behind it in your jorney to saving your princess, all with an exceptional beautifull soundtrack made by the most beautifull singer itself: Sr. Pelo. Its a "Must Play" game for all Sr. Pelo fans.

Sr. Pelo Youtube Channel
